...Ingredients: Milled corn, sugar, soluble corn fiber, molasses, salt, hydrogenated

**10/02/2017**

 

Single Flavor Test: **6%**

60/40 | 0 Nic | 40W | Single 316L SS Fused Clapton | Wasp Nano | Organic Japanese Cotton

 

‚ñ∫**First Impressions (24 hour steep ‚úî)**

‚Ä¢ Knuckle Test:  Smell & Taste

-- Very Pleasant | Aroma Intensity Deep  | Cinnamon? - Caramel, Graham Cracker with Corn & Butter?

-- Heavy Sweetness & Flavorful |Slightly Creamy & Buttery | Caramel...Graham Cracker-ish with Light "Corn" & Grain
-- Off Notes: None

_______________________________________________
**10/16/017 (2 Week Steep ‚úî)**

 

‚ñ∫ Smell / Taste / Feel

‚Ä¢ **Tester Bottle Aroma:**  ‚Üì in Aroma Intensity =Med.Strong (Rounded)
---  "Corn" Grain/Graham Cracker & Caramel-esque Dark Syrup

‚Ä¢ **Knuckle:** Heavy Sweetness & Flavor Intensity | Graham / Syrup - Dominant married with Med."Corn" Grain


‚Ä¢ **Vape:** "Warm" Deep Flavor Intensity | Med. Sweetness | Dense Syrup (Dominant) atop an Amalgamation of a Toasted Graham* / Corn Grain like Cereal | Smooth with Light Tartness

---- Med. Body (Semi Watery) | Med Light Coated Mouth Feel

 


‚ñ∫ Notes

‚Ä¢ Off Notes: None
‚Ä¢ No Cinnamon
‚Ä¢ Hint of Sharpness @ End - Toasted? (not off putting)
______________________________________________
**10/23/2017 (3  Week Steep ‚úî) FINAL** ü•á

 

‚ñ∫ Smell / Taste / Feel

‚Ä¢ **Tester Bottle:** Unchanged ‚úì
Graham Cracker & Caramel-esque Dark Syrup & "Corn" Grain


‚Ä¢ **Knuckle**: Unchanged ‚úì

----- Heavy Sweetness & Flavor Intensity | Graham / Dark *Maple-ish Syrup - Dominant married with Med."Corn" Grain


‚Ä¢ **Vape:** Overall Unchanged ‚úì

"Warm" Deep Flavor Intensity | Med. Sweetness | Dense Maple-like Syrup (Dominant) atop an Amalgamation of a Burnt Sugar Toasted Graham* with a hint of a Light Corn Grain like Cereal | Smooth with Light Tartness

----| Med. Body (Semi Watery) | Med Light Coated Mouth Feel

 

‚ñ∫ Notes

‚Ä¢ Off Notes: Slightly "Burnt / Smokey" Note @ Higher %'s, 

----Smokey Note - Similar to Note in Pie Crust (TPA)
_____________________________________________
Estimate 

‚ñ∫ Usage:   4 - 4.5% min  | 5 - 6 % med   | 6.5% max

Mix: 4.5 - 6%
